LOL, one cannot be expected not to post more than once per day. ^^ 
You can, however, go create yourself a YahooID, and then come to the 
yahoogroup to look at posts, and to post as well. That's what you 
should do if Keta is worried about the number of incoming emails.

The yahoogroup website is http://groups.yahoo.com/group/nbwrpg/ in 
case you didn't have it. Also, I sent you an email which you should 
reply too soon before you join into posting with the RPG.
